title: Social Media Buzz: Rams Players' 'Hands Up' Pose, Backlash Over Criticism Of First Daughters
teaser: Annie Colbert of Mashable takes a look at how the news has been reverberating over the weekend, through the lens of social media.
contentencoded:
Annie Colbert of Mashable joins Here & Now’s Lisa Mullins to take a look at how the news has been reverberating over the weekend, through the lens of social media. The stories include:

  • St. Louis Rams players hold arms up in solidarity with Ferguson protesters
  • Travelers tweet about 1.2 mile long security line at Chigago’s Midway International
  • Congressional aide to resign after Facebook post criticizing Sasha and Malia Obama

Guest

  • Annie Colbert, viral content editor at the news and social media website Mashable. She tweets @anniecolbert.
Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
